did.unittitle: Rockbridge Historical Society files on Rockbridge County fairs

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research use.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington and Lee University Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Rockbridge Historical Society files on Rockbridge County fairs, RHS Coll. 0045, , Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections' staff to verify the appropriate format.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains brochures, premium books, newspaper supplements, and other advertisements for Rockbridge County fairs and festivals.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains brochures for the Arts and Crafts Festival in Lexington, Rockbridge Co. as well as maps to navigate the Rockbridge Community Festival.

did.unittitle: Rockbridge County Agricultural and School Fair

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains a book detailing events and prizes at the 1915 Rockbridge County Agricultural and School Fair.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Also included is a Second Premium 4-H, Rockbridge County Fair, Lexington, Va., 1939 red ribbon.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains brochures and a map of the Rockbridge Regional Fair.
